title: Promoter-Specific User Stories for VAEBZ Platform
description: User stories focused on the needs of event promoters within the proposal workflow system

stories.title: Promoter Idea Submission
stories.description: As a promoter, I want to submit feature ideas directly related to event promotion so that the platform better supports my marketing and audience development needs.
acceptance_criteria: Promoters can submit ideas through the Ideas Board
Ideas can be tagged with 'promoter' category
Promoter-specific idea template is available
Event industry metrics can be referenced in the idea

stories.title: Promoter-Specific Analytics Requirements
stories.description: As a promoter, I want to define analytics requirements in proposals so that new features include the metrics I need to measure marketing effectiveness and ROI.
acceptance_criteria: Promoters can add analytics requirements section to proposals
Predefined promoter metrics templates are available
Custom metrics can be specified
Analytics requirements are preserved through the PRD stage

stories.title: Audience Targeting Specification
stories.description: As a promoter, I want to specify audience targeting capabilities in proposals so that new features help me reach the right potential attendees for my events.
acceptance_criteria: Targeting parameters can be defined in proposals
Audience segment definitions are supported
Integration with existing marketing channels can be specified
Privacy and consent requirements are automatically included

stories.title: Event Performance Metrics
stories.description: As a promoter, I want to include event performance metrics in proposals so that I can measure the impact of new features on ticket sales, attendance, and fan engagement.
acceptance_criteria: Standard event performance metrics library is available
Custom metrics can be added
Baseline measurement methodology can be specified
Metrics are linked to business outcomes

stories.title: Partnership Integration Requirements
stories.description: As a promoter, I want to specify integration requirements with venue and artist systems in proposals so that new features work seamlessly with my partners' processes.
acceptance_criteria: Standard API integration points can be selected
Custom integration requirements can be specified
Security and data sharing parameters are defined
Testing with partner systems is included in the workflow

stories.title: Marketing Campaign Tools
stories.description: As a promoter, I want to include marketing campaign tool requirements in proposals so that new features support my promotional activities effectively.
acceptance_criteria: Campaign creation workflows can be specified
Audience segmentation capabilities are defined
Creative asset management requirements are included
Campaign analytics and reporting needs are documented

stories.title: Beta Testing Phase Participation
stories.description: As a promoter, I want to participate in beta testing of new features from proposals I've contributed to so that I can provide feedback before full release.
acceptance_criteria: Promoters who contributed to proposals are automatically invited to beta
Structured feedback mechanism is available during beta
Real event data can be used in testing (with appropriate safeguards)
Beta metrics are shared with participating promoters

stories.title: Custom UI Component Requests
stories.description: As a promoter, I want to request specific UI components in proposals so that the interface meets my workflow needs for event marketing.
acceptance_criteria: UI component requests can be included in proposals
Mockups or sketches can be attached
Interaction specifications can be defined
Integration with existing promoter dashboard is considered

stories.title: A/B Testing Requirements
stories.description: As a promoter, I want to include A/B testing requirements in proposals so that I can optimize marketing approaches with data-driven decisions.
acceptance_criteria: A/B test setup parameters can be specified
Success metrics for tests are defined
Statistical significance standards are included
Implementation of winning variants is streamlined

stories.title: ROI Calculation Models
stories.description: As a promoter, I want to define ROI calculation models in proposals so that I can demonstrate the business value of new features.
acceptance_criteria: Standard ROI models are available for selection
Custom calculation components can be defined
Input data sources are specified
Visualization of ROI projections is included

stories.title: Festival Planning Integration
stories.description: As a promoter, I want to include festival planning requirements in proposals so that the system supports the complexities of multi-day, multi-venue events.
acceptance_criteria: Festival-specific planning templates are available
Multi-day scheduling features can be specified
Venue coordination capabilities are included
Artist lineup management features are defined

stories.title: Festival Ticket Package Creation
stories.description: As a promoter, I want to define ticket package requirements for festivals so that I can offer multiple attendance options like single-day, multi-day, and VIP passes.
acceptance_criteria: Festival ticket package configuration can be specified
Tiered pricing structures can be defined
Early bird and promotional discount parameters are included
Package comparison visualization requirements are supported

stories.title: Artist Lineup Management
stories.description: As a promoter, I want to include artist lineup management requirements in festival proposals so that I can efficiently coordinate multiple performers across stages and days.
acceptance_criteria: Artist scheduling interface requirements can be specified
Stage assignment features are defined
Time slot management capabilities are included
Conflict detection requirements are supported

stories.title: Festival-Specific Analytics
stories.description: As a promoter, I want to define festival-specific analytics requirements in proposals so that I can measure the performance of multi-day events and improve future festivals.
acceptance_criteria: Day-by-day attendance comparison metrics are available
Stage popularity analysis can be specified
Artist performance correlation metrics are included
Year-over-year festival growth tracking is supported

stories.title: Vendor Management for Festivals
stories.description: As a promoter, I want to specify vendor management requirements in festival proposals so that I can coordinate food, merchandise, and service providers at my events.
acceptance_criteria: Vendor application and selection process can be defined
Vendor placement and map features are included
Revenue sharing agreement tracking is supported
Vendor performance metrics are available

stories.title: Festival Promotion Campaigns
stories.description: As a promoter, I want to define festival-specific marketing campaign requirements in proposals so that I can effectively promote multi-day events to the right audiences.
acceptance_criteria: Festival announcement campaign templates are available
Artist lineup reveal campaign features are included
Ticket tier release promotions are supported
Last-minute ticket push campaign capabilities are defined

stories.title: Cross-Promotion with Artists
stories.description: As a promoter, I want to specify artist cross-promotion requirements in proposals so that I can leverage artist audiences for event marketing.
acceptance_criteria: Artist social media integration points can be defined
Coordinated announcement timing features are included
Content sharing templates are available
Performance tracking across artist channels is supported

stories.title: Event Series Management
stories.description: As a promoter, I want to include event series management requirements in proposals so that I can create and track recurring or themed events across multiple venues or dates.
acceptance_criteria: Series creation and management features can be specified
Themed branding consistency tools are defined
Cross-event analytics are supported
Series ticket bundling capabilities are included

stories.title: Local Market Targeting
stories.description: As a promoter, I want to specify local market targeting requirements in proposals so that I can effectively promote events to specific geographic communities.
acceptance_criteria: Geo-targeted promotion parameters can be defined
Local media integration points are included
Community partnership features are supported
Local business cross-promotion capabilities are specified

stories.title: Fan Engagement for Events
stories.description: As a promoter, I want to define fan engagement requirements in proposals so that I can create interactive experiences before, during, and after events.
acceptance_criteria: Pre-event engagement feature specifications are supported
Live event interaction capabilities can be defined
Post-event follow-up mechanisms are included
Fan-generated content integration points are specified
